text: Christine Charbonneau (18 October 1943 – 29 May 2014) was a Canadian singer and songwriter.La Presse canadienne (CP/PC), She made her first appearance in 1973. She worked with Celine Dion during her thirty-year career. == Career == In 1975, Charbonneau recorded her first album Censuré. == Personal life == Charbonneau was born in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. He died from cancer, aged 70. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Quebec Category:Canadian singers Category:Canadian singer- songwriters Category:People from Montreal
title: Christine Charbonneau
